title: Nijigaku: Towards the Shuffle Festival! Part 5
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Alright, the wrapping is all done! Let’s go give them to everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah, I wonder if they’ll like this as a return gift for Valentine.... Wait, ah! Oh no, I forgot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>What’s up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>We’re doing a relay format interview of everyone for the upcoming Shuffle Festival. I was thinking of interviewing you, but I completely forgot about it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, you remember now, so isn’t it fine? Ai heard about the interview too. Ai is supposed to say how Ai feels and stuff, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yes, could we do it right now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Of course! Let’s see, ever since the first time we talked about doing a Shuffle Festival, Ai has been really hyped up~! Ai is happy that we could make it a reality! Ai wants to have as much fun singing as Ai can, Ai is also looking forward to hearing everyone else’s songs, and Ai wants the people who come to support us to enjoy themselves too~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you really have an insatiable greed for fun things, huh, Ai?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Pretty much! That’s a good thing to be greedy about, after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
